name: TreatmentOrCarePlanMaintenance
title: Treatment or Care Plan Maintenance
description: Self-report of the degree to which the person is able to follow care plan self-management activities (i.e., Taking/doing more than prescribed, Stockpiling medications for a rainyday, Changing the dosing/activity frequency, Getting additional pills from friends and family, Not taking as much meds as prescribed, Not taking the medications) (Business ID: Entry 2742713)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Treatment or Care Plan Maintenance.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an self-report of the degree to which the person is able to follow care plan self-management activities (i.e., taking/doing more than prescribed, stockpiling medications for a rainyday, changing the dosing/activity frequency, getting additional pills from friends and family, not taking as much meds as prescribed, not taking the medications).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Treatment or Care Plan Maintenance.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Treatment or Care Plan Maintenance.)

contains.display: Challenges for treatment plan maintenance panel
Challenges to maintaining treatments or health behaviors
Treatment or health behavior affected by challenges
